channel.title: How do i make mah server public without portfowarding?

item.title: How do i make mah server public without portfowarding?
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

i think he means he doesnt know how to go into the router settings and open ports and do all the no-ip shit. so just use himachi i gues.

item.title: How do i make mah server public without portfowarding?
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

The only way to host a server without portforwarding is to use a client such as hamachi. I would not recommend it. No one likes to use hamachi to play servers Just look for someone else who can host or something

Read full topic

Also, if it’s because of the hassel just look up a tutorial via www.youtube.com - to see Utorrent Portforwarding tutorials.
